00020 #ifndef H_REPOSITORY_URL
00021 #define H_REPOSITORY_URL

00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <stdexcept>
00025 
00026 #include "exceptions.h"

00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {
00029 
00064 using namespace std;
00065 
00066 class Url : public string {
00067 public:
00068     Url(const string& urlString) throw (MalformedUrlException);
00069     Url(const char*) throw (MalformedUrlException);
00070     Url& operator=(const Url& url) throw (MalformedUrlException);
00071 
00075     Url contextualize(const string& context) const throw (MalformedUrlException);
00076     Url decontextualize(const string& context) const throw (MalformedUrlException);
00077     
00079     string getHost() const;
00080 
00083     string getPath() const;
00084 
00086     Url getRelativeUrl(unsigned int partsToSkip) const;
00087 
00089     inline bool startsWith(const string& prefix) const
00090         { return substr(0, prefix.size()) == prefix; }
00091 
00093     inline bool isComplete() const { return substr(0, 6) == "rdk://"; }
00094 
00096     inline bool isRelative() const { return !isComplete() && operator[](0) != '/'; }
00097 
00099     inline bool isAbsolute() const { return !isComplete() && operator[](0) == '/'; }
00100 
00101     int getLevel() const;
00102 
00103 private:
00104     static void checkUrlString(const string& urlString) throw (MalformedUrlException);
00105     static string normalize(string s);
00106 };
00107 
00108 typedef const Url& CUrl;
00109 
00110 }} // end namespace
